description: Updates a dynamic thing group. Requires permission to access the UpdateDynamicThingGroup action.

parameters.name: thingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the dynamic thing group to update.

parameters.name: thingGroupProperties
parameters.description: The dynamic thing group properties to update. thingGroupDescription (string) --- The thing group description. attributePayload (dict) --- The thing group attributes in JSON format. attributes (dict) --- A JSON string containing up to three key-value pair in JSON format. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"string1\":\"string2\"}} (string) --- (string) --- merge (boolean) --- Specifies whether the list of attributes provided in the AttributePayload is merged with the attributes stored in the registry, instead of overwriting them. To remove an attribute, call UpdateThing with an empty attribute value.

nested_params.name: attributePayload
nested_params.description: The thing group attributes in JSON format.

nested_params.name: attributes
nested_params.description: A JSON string containing up to three key-value pair in JSON format. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"string1\":\"string2\"}}

nested_params.name: merge
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the list of attributes provided in the AttributePayload is merged with the attributes stored in the registry, instead of overwriting them. To remove an attribute, call UpdateThing with an empty attribute value.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The dynamic thing group index to update.

parameters.name: queryVersion
parameters.description: The dynamic thing group query version to update.
